name: 16-nasa-project
description: ## Structure and Architecture a project Tools: - Makes diagram - meant to structure the app flow and idea/ breaking down important action 	- lucid: https://www.lucidchart.com/pages/

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run build-client && npm start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run build-client && npm run cluster --prefix server
